name: Collector Crypt
description: Collector Crypt modernizes collectibles by tokenizing physical assets onto the blockchain. Vault your cards securely while trading RWA-backed tokens representing authenticated ownership. Smart contracts eliminate fraud, reduce fees, and enable instant settlements. Experience transparent, efficient collectible trading where physical authenticity meets digital accessibility, built for today's global collector community. Buy digital repacks from our gacha machine, $75m revenue and growing.
